item.title: Testing go 1.5 cross compilation on raspberry pi
item.description: I’m so excited with the new release of golang. One particular feature is now very easy to build for multiple architecture. If you seen my other posts, I also like to tinker with my raspberry-pi. On my previous project I use either ruby or python for building some stuff. One annoying thing is dependency, setup and compilation is usually quite slow. Would be cool if I could just create some stuff in desktop and just scp the binary to pi and everything should work!
